game.name: Saints Row: The Third - Steelport Gangs Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Get some new gangwear for your wardrobe with six new outfits. Disguise yourself as a Morningstar Solider or blend in with the Luchador Specialist crowd. You can even try out the Decker cyberpunk style and get in touch with your inner techno-goth!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Get some new gangwear for your wardrobe with six new outfits. Disguise yourself as a Morningstar Solider or blend in with the Luchador Specialist crowd. You can even try out the Decker cyberpunk style and get in touch with your inner techno-goth!
